title: FootEducation
blurb: Encyclopedic patient education site about foot & ankle conditions. Ongoing maintenance, security hardening, uptime, and SEO support.

title: OrthoEducation (Multisite)
blurb: Network of subsites for musculoskeletal education. Implemented network search and multisite HTML sitemap; tuned UX and performance.

title: Harmony Healing House
blurb: Non-profit health & wellness. Content and site updates, light design support, and general administration.

title: Priority Practice Management
blurb: MSO services site. Ongoing updates, analytics, and content coordination, plus LinkedIn marketing alignment.

title: BayHealth LLC
blurb: Healthcare joint venture site. Assisted with hosting, structure, and maintenance.

title: Multisite HTML Sitemap & Network Search
blurb: WordPress Multisite plugin: `[multisite_sitemap]`, `[network_search_form]`, and `[network_search]` with FootEducation integration.
